name: Patrick McCorry
description: Patrick has spent most of his adult life working on cryptocurrencies and his time was split across academic research and industry. Over the years, he has worked on transaction delivery, layer-2 protocols, atomic swaps, consensus protocols, and applied cryptography. Before Infura, he was an Assistant Professor at Kingâ€™s College London and an accomplished researcher at UCL, UIUC and NCL.
